root.str: Scout Radar detects the movement of hostiles at a range of 60 meters.
Adds cosmetic plating to your Liberator. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "U" Hood Ornament.
Enemy Infiltrator sensor darts and motion spotters can reveal your location; remaining stationary or crouch walking will conceal your presence.

Plastic explosives capable of incredible damage to infantry, MAXes, and vehicles alike.

Use Aim to throw a brick of C-4 and hold Fire to detonate.
Kills while in mid-air as any infantry class.
You have auto joined a squad.
Burns fuel to increase the speed. Fuel lasts up to 1 second. A fully spent fuel tank will regenerate automatically in 35 seconds.
Adds 2 rounds to the default magazine size.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> The facility's diagnostics system is now online, soldier. No damage to speak of. Clean any graffiti you find with your Nano-Armor Kit. Or take out intruders to stop further destruction.
Allows the user to carry 2 EMP Spikers at a time
Whenever you receive damage, 5.5% of your maximum jump jet fuel is restored. <font color="#dc9c36">Light Assault only.</font>
The extra weight in the Horizon SX91's frame allows for minimal, controllable recoil.
Destroy enemy aircraft while in a Galaxy.
Passively increases the ANT's total Cortium Storage by 1750.
<font color="#00FFAA">Dolan:</font> Would you like to know what they found?
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 17 shells.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
The Sunderer is an armored transport capable of carrying an entire squad into battle. It can also be upgraded with a variety of support capabilities.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.48 seconds.
The Banded Skull Helmet causes terror in those unfortunate enough to oppose its wearer. NC use only.
Increases xp and resource gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 7 day. Squad xp bonus stacks with other squad xp boosts. Boost can only be used on this character.
<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly:</font> Survey area bravo located. Deploy the Signal Scanner relay within the noted area.
Unlock defense slot Certifications to increase the Reaver's survivability on the field. Defense slot items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
While your personal shield is active, receiving small arms damage now heals 50 health immediately. This effect may only trigger once every 4 seconds.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership to that player.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 675 rounds.
Apply the Ortho Digital camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.
Apply the single use Urban Forest camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Earn a Silver Medal on 5 different carbines.
Adds Hubcaps NC004 to your Flash. (DNT)
<font color="#00FFAA">Campner:</font> That was some impressive detective work you did out there, operative. Perhaps not as action-packed as you're used to, but valuable none-the-less.
Killing an enemy soldier increases cloak charge by 15%.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 11.25%
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 60 rounds.
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 25 seconds.
Nanites are used to pull vehicles and resupply certain equipment. Your empire awards you with nanites every minute.

The NS-15M AE is an accurate, magazine-fed LMG that leaves little downtime during reloads. This commemorative edition of the popular all-arounder LMG features an exclusive orange stripe paintjob. All factions can use NS weapons.
This customization changes the color of the cockpit glass to SlateBlue.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Kill bounty targets with an LMG.
Outfits are groups of players who work together to accomplish goals in PlanetSide 2!
Destroy enemy tanks while in a Prowler.
The Light Air Terminal can be used to spawn light aircraft such as ESFs and Valkyries at the cost of Cortium.
Increasing this slider to the right will increase vehicle gunner mouse control sensitivity. (Default: 0.50)

Gear up and get back into the fight with this special bundle.

Note: Bundle contains equivalent weapons and cosmetics for all 3 Empires.
VS - Pistol - Mid - V8 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Reduces weight penalty for heavy weapons.
Apply the Black Flames camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the single use Giraffe camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Reaver to 13 minutes.
Destroy enemy aircraft while in a Liberator.
Capture and hold Ixtab Amp Station to gain points
Increases shield recharge rate and strength by a total of 80%.
We encountered a problem deleting this credit card. Please try again.
Unlock and improve the Infiltrator's cloaking abilities. Abilities can be equipped on the loadout screen.
This double serrated combat knife is often bestowed by the leadership of all three Empires to veterans of successful military campaigns.
Adds the Vertigo style hubcaps to your Sunderer. NC use only.
This customization adds a Red decal to the cockpit glass. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Drill Coordinator:</font> Enemies near the drill will prevent you from harvesting. Remove them.
Medics use nanite revivification to get allied forces back up on their feet and back into the battle.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Please use a nearby Equipment Terminal to install the implant. The Analysis HUD will help flag targets of interest on the planet's surface.
Damage the enemy's main battle tanks or Lightnings.
Sticky Grenades attach themselves to most surfaces when thrown.
<u>This offer will not be presented again</u>
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 shells.
Apply the Cyber Wire camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 0.25 seconds, reduces the mini-map auto-detect range of the vehicle to 174 meters and blocks enemy Engagement Radars.
Customize the color of your red dot sights.
The heavy SR-150 outclasses weapons in its class for long-range assassination missions, thanks to additional stopping power and projectile velocity. NSO use only.
Further reduces the amount of damage taken from explosions.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%

Replaces 20% of the Vanguard's health with a fast regenerating shield layer. This shield has a 6 second recharge delay upon receiving damage, and a 10 second delay when broken. Regenerates 100 shield health per second.
Heavier fighting is indicated by more hotspots.
Expend more outfit resources to instantly complete this War Asset.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Sunderer to 15 minutes.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 180.
NS35 Frag Cannon Left Gold Medal
Nanite Systems weapons bought with Battle Cash are useable by all characters on an account unless stated otherwise.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Scythe by 120 seconds.
You must wait [*seconds*] more seconds before issuing another sitrep request.
We have a new TR spawn point.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
The fully automatic NS-61 Emissary operates comfortably at mid-range, thanks to its accuracy and large magazine. All factions can use this weapon.
Customize your Flash with this glowing antenna ball. VS use only.
Unlock consumable items for the Infiltrator's utility slot. Utility items can be equipped on the loadout screen.
V26 Maelstrom Turbo Laser: Gold Medal

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Scan complete, I am told our analysts have confirmed Foster was at that location but is no longer there. They believe they are narrowing the signal down. Please proceed to the next marked scan location.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 25%.
Apply the Indar Highlands v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Stone Cold camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the top speed of the Lightning by 4 KPH.
C-4 Explosives are capable of incredible damage to infantry and vehicles alike.
The anti-air NS-10 Burster uses Smart Unguided Projectiles to explode in the presence of ferrous material at high speeds. VS use only.
Apply the Tiger Stripe camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Replaces a portion of the vehicle's health with a quickly recharging shield.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
The BAR-200 fires larger rounds than its 100 model predecessor, allowing for maximum stopping power at cost to rate of fire. NSO use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 shells.
Slows and disorients enemies within its blast radius.
Apply the Carbon Fiber camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only.
Applies a decal to your armor. VS use only.
The ABLE 3.4x optic provides more zoom depth than a standard reflex, with a yellow wire reticle for mid-range precision.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your Heavy Assault. VS use only.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 10%
Fill in the information below to add a credit card to your account.

<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34:</font> Our mutual benefactor mentioned some vaulted up "Terraforming" corporations on Hossin. I know the ones, they've been up to some shady business if I don't say so myself.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Review your order details before your purchase.
The server you have selected is currently full for your faction. You have been added to the queue to log into the server.
The Standard Issue Intake for the Galaxy.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 11 shells.
To earn resources from a territory it must be owned by your empire and be connected by controlled regions that reach to your warpgate.
Vehicle - Valkyrie - Weapon 06 - 60mm - Ammo - Ammo Capacity 1
The ABLE 1 uses a green bracket reticle for snappy target acquisition at close range.
Increases the roll rate of the Reaver by 8 degrees/second.
Increases outfit resource contributions for 1 hour. Boost can only be used on this character.
Includes both Anti-Vehicle and Anti-Aircraft turret schematics, as well as the Turret AI Module schematic.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 29 rockets.
Adds 1 grenade to the default magazine size.
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 21 shells.
A Cortium Silo is the heart of a player-made base; it powers all modules and Refineries, and stores Cortium for later use.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Single Use Desert Scrub v2 Camo
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Scythe. VS use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 shots.
Adds 13 rounds to the default magazine size.
Your squad is not large enough.
Increases the Infiltrator's Control Console hacking speed
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
The unguided Shrike rocket launcher is equipped with high-explosive warheads and has both anti-personnel and anti-armor capabilities. NC use only.
Get the most popular Infiltrator weapons at a discounted price!

You are about to enter unhealthy gaming time. For your own health, please get offline immediately. If you continue playing, your health will be harmed and your in-game gains will be reduced to 0. Your in-game gain will not become normal until you accumulate 5 hours of offline time.
VR Training has a custom loadout slot for classes and vehicles that is separate from normal loadouts.
Apply the Amerish Forest v2 camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Abstract camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only.
Increases the Nano-Regen Device's recharge rate by 8%.
Allies who are below 150 health passively heal for 15 health per second while you are within 7 meters. <font color="#dc9c36">Combat Medic only.</font>
Anyway, your combat gear is waiting for you. Just need you to reconfigure your weapons and loadouts at the equipment terminal over there.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a TR Hood Ornament. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 56 rounds.
Outfit invite failed. NSO players need to have selected a home faction in order to be invited to an outfit.
Gather Tempest from the meteor site and return it to your Warpgate.
Jagged metal hands make for good weaponry against the average Auraxian.
Reduces damage taken from anti-tank mines by 33%.
Adds 38 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 rockets.

Apply the single use Indar Canyons v2 camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases experience gain by 50% for 1 day. Boost can only be used on this character.
Could not transfer leadership due to bad player ID.
Your petition to join [*guild*] has been revoked.

Could not transfer fireteam leadership due to bad group.

This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon with a sleek black finish. Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 70 rounds.
Order of the Dragon Armor Decal
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 225 rounds.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a 6.5 second cooldown between uses.
... as long as your choice fits within the predefined parameters of the voice packs currently available for selection, which they realistically should.
You are personally responsible for keeping us all alive. No pressure!
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 10.83% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
NC: Customization - Rocket Launcher Decimator Promo

Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Adds 13 rounds to the default magazine size.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> The Tempest Capacitor is the beating heart of the Containment Site. Esamir is safer if the Tempest Siphon remains active, but you cannot reach the capture point while it is.
Composite armor increases the Liberators base resistance to flak, light tank rounds and heavy tank rounds by 7, 10, and 15% respectively.
Increases the top speed of the Mosquito by 6 KPH.
This customization adds a Dark Green decal to the cockpit glass. VS use only.

This prototype Galaxy configuration can deploy as an advanced mobile station.

Capture Amerish within the time limit
The Turret Control Unit is the master computer for the phalanx turrets. Defend it from enemy attack or all turrets will be disabled.
The video upload system functionality you are using is currently not implemented. (501)
Further improves cruise and afterburner speed.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Signal Scanner relay successfully deployed. Advance to the next area and continue to use the tool to find the next survey location.
Repairs 0.5% every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.

Streamlines the Reaver's performance in favor of dogfighting manuevers. It Improves the turn power, roll power and overall agility of the Reaver.

Increasing resolution will improve visual clarity. Higher resolutions may impact performance. Choose a resolution that matches your monitor's aspect ratio.

Caps the framerate to improve performance consistency. (Default: On)
Increases the roll rate of the aircraft.
Depending on the weapon, increases ammo capacity per arm by an amount equal to 4 or 8 standard size magazines.
Adds fuel tanks to your Sunderer. NC use only.
This 4th Anniversary Edition of the RAMS .50 harnesses high muzzle velocity and stopping power to hit harder and faster than other sniper rifles in its class. TR use only.
The Terran Republic has defended Zurvan!
Applies a decal to your vehicle. NC use only.

A festive, camouflage-friendly grey cap featuring the Nanite Systems logo. Can be equipped by NC/VS/TR.

Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 325 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.

Earn experience from kills earned by allied soldiers who used your deployed Reclaimed Valkyrie, Reclaimed Galaxy, or Reclaimed Sunderer to respawn.
Place a personal waypoint in the highlighted area of the map. This waypoint can be used to guide us to our destination.

Displays health of damaged, spotted enemies; also increases the range that the reticule can identify enemies.

Now you're ready to see the Nano-Cycler in action! Use the <font color="#7ff4ff">Construct</font> button to <font color="#7ff4ff">consume</font> selected components and create your new and <font color="#7ff4ff">virtually radiation-free</font> implant*

This Rocklet is armed with variable Armor Piercing and Flashbang capabilities. Flashbangs blind nearby infantry for a short period.
Enables the Sunderer to deploy into an Advanced Mobile Station. The AMS acts as a respawn point for friendly soldiers.
A precursor to the Tengu SMG, the NSX Kappa spits out three heavy pellets per shot, and was the first SMG to integrate a smart choke system that tightens pellet spread while aiming down sights.

It's time to get back into the fight, soldier! We're gearing you up with new infantry armor, and special edition weaponry and equipment. This bundle contains VS, NC, and TR item equivalents, and an NSO-specific camo. Implants and boosts are only available to the character who purchases the bundle.
